sourcesContent:
import { Component, EventEmitter, Input, Output } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import CustomerUpdateRequest from 'src/app/models/CustomerUpdateRequest'; @Component({ selector: 'app-update-customer', templateUrl: './update-customer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./update-customer.component.scss'] }) export class UpdateCustomerComponent { @Input() customer: CustomerUpdateRequest={} @Output() update: EventEmitter=new EventEmitter(); isValid() { return this.minLength(this.customer.name) && this.minLength(this.customer.email) && this.minLength(this.customer.password) && this.customer.age !== undefined && this.customer.age > 0; } private minLength(input:string | undefined): boolean { return input!==null && input!==undefined && input.length > 0 } onSubmit(): void { return this.update.emit(this.customer); } }

New Customer
